translations: 奶油浓汤；有马铃薯的奶油汤

sentences.sentence: So the etymology of vichyssoise will come first.
sentences.translation: 那么先来看一下这个词的词源。

sentences.sentence: Sothe etymology of vichyssoise will come first.
sentences.translation: 那么先来看一下这个词的词源。

sentences.sentence: Vichyssoise is made with potatoes and leeks and cream.
sentences.translation: 奶油土豆浓汤由土豆、韭葱和奶油做成。
